<table cellpadding="5">
<tt><td>*English*</td><td>*Scardf*</td></tt>
<tr>
<td>_John's children are Anna and Bob._</td>
<td>`john -children-> List( anna, bob )`</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>_Family members are resources of type "person"._</td>
<td>`val familyMembers = g/-/having( RDF.Type -> person )`</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>_All family members who have a male spouse._</td>
<td>`familyMembers/where( _/spouse/isMale? )`</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>_John's weight is not stated in graph g._</td>
<td>`g/john has( weight -> None )`</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>_Family members which like science._</td>
<td>`familyMembers/where( _/likes contains science )`</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>_Triples stating that someone's height is less than 100._</td>
<td>`g.triplesLike( Node, height, { h: Literal => asInt(h) < 100 } )`</td>
</tr>
</table>
